document.full_text: a spring blizzard dumped up to 16 inches of snow in nebraska, stranding dozens of motorists and forcing the closure of state's main highway, interstate 80, for a 120 mile stretch, officials said on friday.
document.title: blizzard shuts i-80 in nebraska, strands motorists
lines_and_colors: a spring blizzard dumped up to 16 inches of snow in nebraska, stranding dozens of motorists and forcing the closure of state's main highway, interstate 80, for a 120 mile stretch, officials said on friday.
